title: Sunday Debate Breakdown Livestream #4: Chomsky vs. Foucault with Matt McManus and Russ Sbriglia
description:
For the fourth installment of our regular Sunday series watching and breaking down old debates, Ben is joined by Russ Sbriglia and Matt McManus to watch Noam Chomsky's classic debate with Michel Foucault.

Independent creators rely on your support to create the content you want!
